document.topic_text: Posted Aug. 21, 2016 @ 12:05 am Posted Aug. 21, 2016 @ 12:05 am » Social News Felony arrests Drug Possession — John Thomas McCutcheon, 49, of the 400 block of North Phoenix Road, Medford. Medford police arrested McCutcheon Friday on a felony charge of methamphetamine possession, and for violating his probation on a third-degree robbery conviction. He was lodged in the Jackson County Jail Friday without bail. Identity Theft — Christopher Allen Alvarez, 31, no known address. Medford police arrested Alvarez Friday on felony charges of identity theft and methamphetamine possession, misdemeanor charges of fraudulent use of a credit card, third-degree theft and third-degree criminal mischief. He was booked in the jail Friday and released on his own recognizance. Drug Possession — Donald Franklin Thomas III, 41, of the 100 block of De Hgue Street, Medford. Medford police arrested Thomas Friday on a felony charge of possessing a Schedule II controlled substance, and for violating his parole on a previous unauthorized use of a motor vehicle conviction. He was lodged in jail Friday without bail. Drug Possession — Marian Ellian Ellsworth, 24, no known address. Medford police arrested Ellsworth Saturday on a felony charge of methamphetamine possession, a misdemeanor contempt of court charge, and on a sanction from a previous meth possession charge. She was lodged in jail Saturday without bail. Drug Possession — Allison Ruby Christian, 22, of the 700 block of Oak Street, Ashland. Talent police arrested Christian Saturday on a felony charge of heroin possession, and on misdemeanor charges of providing false information to police and driving while suspended. She was booked in the jail Saturday and released because of overcrowding. Aggravated Theft — Michael Shane Akers, 35, of the 2400 block of Roberts Road, Medford. Jackson County sheriff's deputies arrested Akers Saturday on felony counts of aggravated first-degree theft, first-degree theft, methamphetamine possession and possession of a Schedule I controlled substance. He was lodged in jail Saturday on $60,000 bail. MailTribune.com Posted Aug. 21, 2016 @ 12:05 am » Comment or view comments
